thread.title: 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers: Lesotho face Comoros today in first leg tie with winner set to play Ghana
thread.title_full: 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers: Lesotho face Comoros today in first leg tie with winner set to play Ghana

title: 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers: Lesotho face Comoros today in first leg tie with winner set to play Ghana
text:
FIFA 2010 Sports News | 7 October 2015 21:55 CET 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers: Lesotho face Comoros today in first leg tie with winner set to play Ghana - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Lesotho will take on the Comoros with high spirits in their 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifier on Wednesday, as their captain Moitheri Ntobo will be available. 
Lesotho is expected to have a few changes in their team as they did not do well in their last match against Algeria, an AFCON qualifier. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
